计软智网转专业试题回忆版、模拟题及参考解答
  • 计软智 2022 年试题
  • 1. Fill in the blanks in the following programs. (20 scores)
  • 1. (10 scores)

1. (10 scores)

The following program implements finding the smallest number, the output is as following, please complement it.

翻译

以下程序实现了查找最小值, 输出如下所示, 请补全它.

1Output:
21

 1#include <iostream>
 2
 3using namespace std;
 4
 5void find(int* a, int n, int i, int& pk) {
 6  if (i < /* (1) */) {
 7    if (a[i] < /* (2) */) {
 8      pk = i;
 9    }
10    find(a, n, /* (3) */, pk);
11  }
12}
13
14auto main() -> int {
15  int a[] = {4, 2, 6, 1, 7, 3};
16  int n   = 0;
17  find(a, /* (4) */, 0, n);
18  cout << /* (5) */ << endl;
19}

点击查看解答参考

[在线代码 vdqPE4We1]

  1. n, 判断索引是否已经超出数组长度.

  2. a[pk], 比较当前索引的值与当前最小值之间的大小.

  3. i + 1, 向右继续查找.

  4. 6, 传递数组的长度.

  5. a[n], 输出最小值.
